job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Company Description

   Join us in pioneering AI Solutions for Market Research and shape its future! SKIM is a fast-growing marketing research consultancy with offices in the US, Europe, Asia and South America. We specialize in modelling and understanding people's decision making in the areas of New Product Development, Brand Communication and Revenue Growth Management & Pricing. In our vision, a combination of methodological robustness, marketing domain expertise and understanding the client's business is the key to building lasting strategic partnerships with our clients.

   As evidenced by our #3 position in GRIT's report of most innovative research agencies, we believe in continuously improving our solutions and expertise frameworks. But above all else, we believe in a culture where smart, ambitious and genuine people support each other, follow their dreams, balance priorities in life and bring everyone's unique skills together in a collaborative global community.

   Job Description

   The AI Team is part of a larger Methodology & Analytics Team that helps create new innovative solutions for our analysts worldwide. We are looking for someone to join our AI Team and help us develop innovative cloud applications for market research clients. If you identify yourself as an AI Engineer, Machine Learning Engineer or Data Scientist and you like the idea of building cloud applications that leverage AI, then this job might be for you!

   As an AI Engineer, you will play a crucial role in the growing and dynamic team. Specifically, you will:

   Research & Develop
     * Develop deep learning powered AI, especially LLM applications tailored for market research clients
     * Support the development of interactive dashboards
     * Work with LLM providers, such as OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, etc.
     * Work with various cloud services, particularly AWS (EC2, ECS, Lambda, etc.).
     * Collaborate closely with AI specialists, cloud experts and stakeholders to deliver robust, scalable solutions.
       Guide & Lead
     * Continuously learn more about business applications and propose innovative AI solutions to address business challenges. Taking the initiative is expected.
     * Stay up to date with the latest AI and LLM developments.
     * Help us develop internal trainings on AI/ML.
       Qualifications
       You will play a critical role in developing outstanding AI-enhanced market research solutions. The ideal candidate will have outstanding conceptual thinking and great execution when developing AI solutions Typically, we are looking for someone with the following profile:
     * MSc or PhD in Computer Science, AI, or related fields. Formal education or significant practical experience in programming is essential.
     * 2+ years of working experience on deep learning, NLP experience is preferred
     * Interest in marketing and market research
     * Experience in working with LLMs
     * Experience with Docker and Git
     * Proficiency in Python, PyTorch, and/or Tensorflow
     * Proven experience of creating MVPs using Streamlit, Gradio or similar
     * Experience with Cloud Computing and Deployment (AWS, Azure and/or GCP)
     * Interest in learning business applications of AI
     * Excellent written and oral communication skills in English
       Additionally, the following are a plus:
     * Experience with CI/CD and IaC (Terraform, CloudFormation etc.)
     * Some experience with R, in order to help R/Shiny developers
     * Experience in dashboard development and maintenance
     * Experience with web development frameworks such as Flask
       Our offer
     * SKIM is an equal opportunity employer and offers a flexible working environment and people-centric culture where people who appreciate intellectual freedom, team play and a "can do" mentality thrive. We offer a competitive salary & benefits package that includes the following:
     * Annual performance-based and profit-sharing bonus
     * A hybrid working environment
     * High value placed on taking initiative and ownership
     * Passionate, intelligent, and supporting colleagues
     * Open, communicative, and international work environment
     * Flat organizational structure
     * Focus on true work / life balance
     * Regular team outings and events
     * SKIM University with a broad selection of trainings
     * Company pension scheme
       At SKIM, we value diversity, equity and inclusion. With increased diversity comes greater variety of perspectives, ideas and creativity, and we foster an environment where everyone feels welcome and comfortable to be their authentic selves. Therefore, we welcome diversity in applicants and base our hiring decisions regardless of age, race, color, religion, ethnicity, nationality, gender, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, genetic characteristics, marital or military status.
       Additional Information
       Thank you for taking the time to read the description of this role, and we look forward to reading your submission if this role sounds very exciting to you! We read each application carefully and will get back to you as soon as we can.
job_details.full_text:
AI Engineer

Company Description

   Join us in pioneering AI Solutions for Market Research and shape its future! SKIM is a fast-growing marketing research consultancy with offices in the US, Europe, Asia and South America. We specialize in modelling and understanding people's decision making in the areas of New Product Development, Brand Communication and Revenue Growth Management & Pricing. In our vision, a combination of methodological robustness, marketing domain expertise and understanding the client's business is the key to building lasting strategic partnerships with our clients.

   As evidenced by our #3 position in GRIT's report of most innovative research agencies, we believe in continuously improving our solutions and expertise frameworks. But above all else, we believe in a culture where smart, ambitious and genuine people support each other, follow their dreams, balance priorities in life and bring everyone's unique skills together in a collaborative global community.

   Job Description

   The AI Team is part of a larger Methodology & Analytics Team that helps create new innovative solutions for our analysts worldwide. We are looking for someone to join our AI Team and help us develop innovative cloud applications for market research clients. If you identify yourself as an AI Engineer, Machine Learning Engineer or Data Scientist and you like the idea of building cloud applications that leverage AI, then this job might be for you!

   As an AI Engineer, you will play a crucial role in the growing and dynamic team. Specifically, you will:

   Research & Develop
     * Develop deep learning powered AI, especially LLM applications tailored for market research clients
     * Support the development of interactive dashboards
     * Work with LLM providers, such as OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, etc.
     * Work with various cloud services, particularly AWS (EC2, ECS, Lambda, etc.).
     * Collaborate closely with AI specialists, cloud experts and stakeholders to deliver robust, scalable solutions.
       Guide & Lead
     * Continuously learn more about business applications and propose innovative AI solutions to address business challenges. Taking the initiative is expected.
     * Stay up to date with the latest AI and LLM developments.
     * Help us develop internal trainings on AI/ML.
       Qualifications
       You will play a critical role in developing outstanding AI-enhanced market research solutions. The ideal candidate will have outstanding conceptual thinking and great execution when developing AI solutions Typically, we are looking for someone with the following profile:
     * MSc or PhD in Computer Science, AI, or related fields. Formal education or significant practical experience in programming is essential.
     * 2+ years of working experience on deep learning, NLP experience is preferred
     * Interest in marketing and market research
     * Experience in working with LLMs
     * Experience with Docker and Git
     * Proficiency in Python, PyTorch, and/or Tensorflow
     * Proven experience of creating MVPs using Streamlit, Gradio or similar
     * Experience with Cloud Computing and Deployment (AWS, Azure and/or GCP)
     * Interest in learning business applications of AI
     * Excellent written and oral communication skills in English
       Additionally, the following are a plus:
     * Experience with CI/CD and IaC (Terraform, CloudFormation etc.)
     * Some experience with R, in order to help R/Shiny developers
     * Experience in dashboard development and maintenance
     * Experience with web development frameworks such as Flask
       Our offer
     * SKIM is an equal opportunity employer and offers a flexible working environment and people-centric culture where people who appreciate intellectual freedom, team play and a "can do" mentality thrive. We offer a competitive salary & benefits package that includes the following:
     * Annual performance-based and profit-sharing bonus
     * A hybrid working environment
     * High value placed on taking initiative and ownership
     * Passionate, intelligent, and supporting colleagues
     * Open, communicative, and international work environment
     * Flat organizational structure
     * Focus on true work / life balance
     * Regular team outings and events
     * SKIM University with a broad selection of trainings
     * Company pension scheme
       At SKIM, we value diversity, equity and inclusion. With increased diversity comes greater variety of perspectives, ideas and creativity, and we foster an environment where everyone feels welcome and comfortable to be their authentic selves. Therefore, we welcome diversity in applicants and base our hiring decisions regardless of age, race, color, religion, ethnicity, nationality, gender, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, genetic characteristics, marital or military status.
       Additional Information
       Thank you for taking the time to read the description of this role, and we look forward to reading your submission if this role sounds very exciting to you! We read each application carefully and will get back to you as soon as we can.

job_profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes developing applications using Large Language Models (LLMs) and generative AI, including fine-tuning and working with LLM providers. It also highlights building user-facing cloud applications and integrating AI features, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.

phrases: Develop deep learning powered AI, especially LLM applications tailored for market research clients
Work with LLM providers, such as OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, etc.
Experience in working with LLMs
deep learning
NLP experience is preferred
AI/ML
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to the development, adaptation, and use of machine learning models, specifically focusing on deep learning and Large Language Models (LLMs) for client applications.

phrases: help us develop innovative cloud applications for market research clients
building cloud applications that leverage AI
develop outstanding AI-enhanced market research solutions
creating MVPs using Streamlit, Gradio or similar
Experience with web development frameworks such as Flask
Support the development of interactive dashboards
Experience in dashboard development and maintenance
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate the need to build and integrate AI capabilities into user-facing applications, including cloud applications, dashboards, and prototypes, requiring traditional software development skills.

phrases: Work with various cloud services, particularly AWS (EC2, ECS, Lambda, etc.)
Cloud Computing and Deployment (AWS, Azure and/or GCP)
Experience with Docker and Git
Experience with CI/CD and IaC (Terraform, CloudFormation etc.)
job_tasks.justification: These phrases point to the operational aspects of deploying and managing AI solutions in the cloud, including containerization, cloud services, and infrastructure as code, which are key components of MLOps.

phrases: AI Solutions for Market Research
market research clients
marketing domain expertise
client's business
business applications and propose innovative AI solutions to address business challenges
Interest in marketing and market research
Interest in learning business applications of AI
job_tasks.justification: These phrases demonstrate the requirement to understand the market research domain, client needs, and business challenges to effectively apply AI solutions.

phrases: Continuously learn more about business applications
Stay up to date with the latest AI and LLM developments
Interest in learning business applications of AI
SKIM University with a broad selection of trainings
job_tasks.justification: The job description explicitly mentions the need to stay current with AI advancements and learn about business applications, indicating a strong emphasis on continuous learning and adaptability.

phrases: pioneering AI Solutions
shape its future
continuously improving our solutions
propose innovative AI solutions
Taking the initiative is expected
High value placed on taking initiative and ownership
can do" mentality
job_tasks.justification: Phrases like 'pioneering', 'innovative', 'taking initiative', and 'ownership' highlight the expectation for proactive contribution and leadership in developing new AI solutions.

phrases: Collaborate closely with AI specialists, cloud experts and stakeholders
Help us develop internal trainings on AI/ML
Excellent written and oral communication skills in English
passionate, intelligent, and supporting colleagues
Open, communicative, and international work environment
job_tasks.justification: The job requires close collaboration with various teams and stakeholders, as well as excellent communication skills, both written and oral, for effective teamwork and knowledge sharing.
